mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (tel, user_name, nickname, real_name, avatar, create_time) SELECT #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE tel = #{tel})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, tel, nickname, real_name, pwd, avatar, create_time FROM user WHERE tel = #{tel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_location (user_id, appType, eid, longitude, latitude, create_time) SELECT #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user_location WHERE eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND appType = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND create_time > DATE_SUB(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INTERVAL 2 HOUR))
